## PathBDTO.registerRoutes() method

Persists all existing routes of the express app in the database

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
registerRoutes(app: any, ECLUDED_PATHS: string[]): Promise<[Promise<boolean | PathModel>[]]>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  app | any | express app |
|  ECLUDED\_PATHS | string\[\] | array of paths which should not be registered in the database. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;\[Promise&lt;boolean \| [PathModel](./clm-core.pathmodel.md)<!-- -->&gt;\[\]\]&gt;
